name: Hey! Pirates!
description:
Hey! Pirates!

This game was originally inspired by a test question involving pirates and potato guns from my Grade 12 Physics class. I got a protoype working at the time, but feature creep lead me to abandon the project. After laying dormant on my GitHub for years, I decided to clean it up and release it. I've stripped out most of the big unfinished features, fixed bugs, polished the existing gameplay, and added music and sound.

Mechanically, this is basically a mashing game (no pun intended!). Try to survive the endless waves of pirate invaders for as long as possible!

Controls Shoot, MenuLeft-click Switch weaponRight-click Close game (desktop only)EscFullscreen (desktop only)F4
